dmca.title: DMCA labelflorist.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Licensing manager [mailto:licensing@qualiteam.biz] 
Sent: Wednesday, August 17, 2005 1:58 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA labelflorist.com

Dear Sir/Madam,

I'd like to ask you to delete all the x-cart files at labelflorist.com

This request is corroborated by the DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT, the
infringement notice can be found in the attachment.

Please inform me about the progress in this issue.

--
Sincerely yours,
Andrey Zhavoronkov
Licensing Manager

Qualiteam corp.             [web site] www.x-cart.com, www.litecommerce.com
Glavpochtamt, p/o box 5152  [ phone  ] +7-(8422)-429038  (9:00-18:00 GMT +4)
432072 Ulyanovsk, Russia    [ fax    ] +1-270-568-5165  (on a 24 hours
basis)

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries
George Poletes, Legal Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
phone: 214.782.7800
fax: 214.782.7756
copyright@theplanet.com

Andrey E. Zhavoronkov
Licensing manager,
Creative Development LLC,
432027, Bakinskaja 44, Ulyanovsk, Russia
+7 (8422) 429038
Email: licensing@x-cart.com

Copyright Infringement Notice
Notice of Copyright Infringement


The copyrighted work at issue appears at www.x-cart.com.

The material that is infringing on copyrighted work is located at: URL: www.labelflorist.com. The above pages contain php code content that has been copied from www.x-cart.com website.

My contact information:
Andrey E. Zhavoronkov
Licensing manager
Creative Development LLC
432027, Bakinskaja 44, Ulyanovsk, Russia
+7 (8422) 429038

Contact information for the infringing party:
Labelle Florist
Connie van Reenen
160 Provencher Boulevard
Winnipeg, MB (CA)
R2H0G3
2049827298
2042338371

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


 
Andrey E. Zhavoronkov, on behalf of Ruslan R. Fasliev
09-Aug-05
